remarks: Closure of vector subtraction.  ( ~ hvsubcl analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 31-Mar-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)
statement:
lmodvsubcl.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lmodvsubcl.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` W ) $.
lmodvsubcl $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V /\ Y e. V ) -> ( X .- Y ) e. V ) $.
